entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Kincardine
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:07 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Goderich 12:00 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: -1.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -7.8°C
Wind: WSW 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow near noon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this morning and minus 3 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
